Topics: Physiology of Microbial Growth: Batch – continuous - synchronous cultures;
Growth curve and measurement method (turbidity, biomass, and cell count).

Units.Unit_Name: Basic Concepts Of Aerobic And Anaerobic Metabolic Pathways
Topics: Nutrition Requirements - Photoautotrophs, photoorganotrophs, chemolithotrophs (Ammonia, Nitrite, Sulfur, Hydrogen, Iron oxidizing Bacteria), chemoorganotrophs.
Nutrition transport mechanisms – Passive diffusion and Active transport.

Units.Unit_Name: Nalyze The Role Of Individual Components In Overall
Topics: An overview of Metabolism - Embden Meyerhof Pathway, Entner- Doudoroff Pathway, Pentose Phosphate Pathway, Tricarboxylic Acid Cycle.
Electron Transport Chain and Oxidative Phosphorylation.
Fermentation-Homolactic Fermentation, Heterolactic Fermentation, Mixed Acid Fermentation, Butanediol Fermentation.

Units.Unit_Name: Provide Information On Sources Of Energy And Its
Topics: Photosynthesis - An overview of chloroplast structure.
Photosynthetic Pigments, Light Reaction-Cyclic and non-cyclic Photophosphorylation.
Bacterial reproduction - Binary fission, Budding, Reproduction through conidia, cyst formation, endospore formation.
Fungi asexual and sexual reproduction, Microalgae reproduction.
Asexual and sexual reproduction of protozoa.
